publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6633.1 Shona Robison: Free Personal Care for the Elderly—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6633) in the name of Ross Finnie, insert at end ", and welcomes the wide-ranging Reshaping Care for Older People programme, which is developing innovative and practical ideas for change to meet the needs of Scotland’s population that are sustainable, deliverable and fair." Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*
